noDataMessage: We’re still learning your focus patterns in this time range. Keep recording your sessions, and we’ll provide personalized analysis soon.

interruptions.unlocks: leaving the app during the timer
interruptions.scrolls: doing other activities during the timer

danger: focus stability is at high risk.
maintaining focus is difficult right now.
stable: you’re sustaining a solid level of concentration.
good: your focus condition is near peak.

excellent: aim to keep performance at this level.
continue performing at a high standard.
risingStable: You're steadily improving. As you get more comfortable, try extending your focus time little by little.
Great upward trend. Make it a goal to gradually increase your session length.
You're making good progress. It might be a good time to start lengthening your sessions step by step.
You're heading in the right direction. Try increasing your focus duration gradually.
stableHigh: continue maintaining a strong level of concentration.
minorImprovement: reduce {{issue}} slightly to refine your results.
a small adjustment to {{issue}} will bring you closer to optimal.
reducing {{issue}} a bit will improve overall quality.
addressing {{issue}} will further strengthen your results.
risingMedium: You're showing improvement! Try extending your focus sessions step by step.
Good progress. Gradually increase your session length as you build momentum.
You're on the right track. Focus on extending your concentration time little by little.
Positive trend. Work on lengthening your focus periods progressively.
risingWithTip: lower '{{issue}}' further to support the trend (avg {{count}} times).
risingMultiTip: focus on reducing '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) for better control.
noIssue: aim to lengthen focus time now.
singleIssue: primary disruption: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—work on reducing this.
'{{issue}}' is impacting your sessions (avg {{count}} times)—address this factor.
concentration loss is mostly linked to '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times).
main distraction detected: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—prioritize improvement here.
multiIssue: lower both '{{issue1}}' (avg {{count1}}) and '{{issue2}}' (avg {{count2}}) for better focus.
lowScoreNoIssue: increase session length step by step.
extend duration progressively to build stamina.
add a few more minutes to each session.
lowScoreWithIssue: your main challenge is '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—tackle this first.
lower the impact of '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) to improve results.
